title: Matrix â€” Emergence Necessity
description: An interactive installation exploring Emergence Theory through a modular matrix system. Each module responds to external stimuli, demonstrating how simple units collectively create complex, emergent behaviors.
role: Concept Development, Mechanical Design, Coding, System Integration
challenges: Merging abstract emergence theory into a tangible interactive form.
solution: Triangular motion modules with servo and sensor-based responsiveness controlled. Visualized emergent behaviors; showcased the aesthetic and conceptual synergy of motion and system interaction.

title: AIxchange
description: A speculative design concept envisioning a future AI-mediated communication system. The system integrates wearable devices and LLMs to optimize tone, empathy, and clarity during conversations, questioning authenticity in AI-filtered communication.
challenges: Miscommunication and emotional conflict in human interactions.
solution: Designed an AI wearable system to transcribe and reframe speech empathetically in real time.
outcome: Provoked critical discussion about emotional authenticity, privacy, and empathy in AI-mediated futures.
